about_the_game:
Trial version of “Mobile Officer Earth: Gumble”, a one-hit wonder Berserk game with a Showa period tokusatsu feel.
Trial version of the control tutorial only.
Enjoy the feeling of being able to enjoy various “Ikkitousen” actions with only 2 buttons: 1 button for attacking, and 1 button for jumping, shooting, transforming, and special moves!
Enjoy the feeling of control with a variety of “Ikkitousen” action with only two buttons!
You can also enjoy the “Showa Special Effects Hero Show” before and after the battles!

In addition, a time attack feature is also implemented, so you can post a screenshot on SNS when you get a good score!

The developer will be very happy if you wish to use the wish list if you enjoy the tokusatsu feeling of the game and if the controls feel good!

name: Mobile Police Officer EARTH Gumble Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 又は AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti 又は Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
